name: Keqing
desc:
"Driving Thunder" Keqing

She can build decks heretofore not conceived and win battles in which victory is unthinkable.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 4 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> , deals 3 <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing characters on standby.

<color=#ece5d8>Lightning Stiletto</color>
<color=#ffd780>Event Card</color>
<color=#ffffff>Combat Actions</color> : Switch your Keqing in to be the active character and immediately use Stellar Restoration once. This instance of Stellar Restoration will grant Keqing <color=#ffffff>Electro Infusion</color> without creating another Lightning Stiletto. (When Keqing uses Stellar Restoration with this card in Hand: Instead of creating another Lightning Stiletto, discard this card and Keqing gains <color=#ffffff>Electro Infusion</color> )
<color=#ece5d8>Electro Infusion</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
The character to which this is attached has their Physical DMG dealt converted to <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 2</color>

Applies Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Piercing DMG</color>
Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bounses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.
<color=#ece5d8>Combat Action</color>
After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponents turn.
<color=#ffffff>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action.</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Duration (Rounds)</color>
Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.
This card will be discarded immediately once <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.

value.name: Thundering Penance
value.desc:
Keqing: Thundering Penance

As long as you're not actually cheating, this is just the name of a card.

value.text: Reward for inviting Keqing to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Keqing
value.desc: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis's unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue — but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

customize.name: Keqing
customize.desc:
"Driving Thunder" Keqing

She can build decks heretofore not conceived and win battles in which victory is unthinkable.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"I guess we can just count this as a break from work... Let's have a match or two, then."
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: Keqing's deck contains many Artifact and Event Cards, allowing her to change her tactics flexibly.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Keqing
customize.desc:
"Driving Thunder" Keqing

She can build decks heretofore not conceived and win battles in which victory is unthinkable.

customize.name: Ganyu
customize.desc:
"Plenilune Gaze" Ganyu

"This press release is due tomorrow… I suppose I could work through the night and get it done.”

customize.name: Xiangling
customize.desc:
"Exquisite Delicacy" Xiangling

As a chef, she is practically omnipotent.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Let's get this done quick. Whether it's work or cards, we should take it seriously."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Keqing" starts with the Talent Card "Thundering Penance" equipped.</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.
